LVOT.name: Aortic Sinuses Diameter
LVOT.note: There are two sets of measurements, one through cusp-cusp and another through cusp-commisure, see Burman, E. D., Keegan, J., & Kilner, P. J. (2008). Aortic root measurement by cardiovascular magnetic resonance: specification of planes and lines of measurement and corresponding normal values. Circulation: Cardiovascular Imaging, 1(2), 104-113. for details
